name: Car Price Project
description: Developed a powerful regression model in Python using scikit-learn to accurately predict car auction prices based on car brands, models, manufacturing years, and other relevant factors, delivering valuable insights for market analysis.

name: Steganography
description: Engineered an innovative pipeline in Python utilizing OpenCV for advanced image processing, implementing cutting-edge steganography techniques to securely conceal user identification in images, audio, and backgrounds.

name: Wav 2 Talking Head Cartoon
description: Designed and implemented an advanced neural network model using TensorFlow and Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to create lifelike talking head animations from spoken voices, enhancing interactive experiences.

name: Cardboard QR Code Classification
description: Built and trained a highly efficient deep learning model using TensorFlow and EfficientNet to achieve rapid and precise classification of QR code images, streamlining automated processes.

name: Symptom Clustering
description: Developed an advanced NLP model in Python using spaCy and scikit-learn to classify medical symptoms from textual data, aiding healthcare professionals in diagnosing conditions more effectively.

name: Optimized Employee Performance
description: Delivered end-to-end Python solutions to optimize employee performance and feedback processes, empowering organizations to enhance productivity and facilitate employee growth.

name: End-to-End Data Lakehouse Project
description: Led the successful implementation of an end-to-end data lakehouse architecture using Apache Spark, Apache Superset, Apache Iceberg, and Min.io, ensuring efficient data storage, processing, and visualization for business-critical insights.
